text: Hi! I saw that Turing.jl provides a `SGHMC` algorithm, and I also encountered examples that use it (e.g. in Bayesian Neural ODEs). But, I did not find any documentation, and I did not get it to work. What is the current state on `SGHMC`, can it actually be used or is it not advised?
